nodes.bodyText: Because GRAVEL and SOUL_SAND exist in the superclass, but :thonkjang: created new fields here

Think enigma doesn't allow that. There are public static final fields for gravel and soul sand in the super class SurfaceBuilder. You can just change on github and if it's illegal, travis will just fail and notify you.
Ah. I think this is that one Enigma bug again (FabricMC/Enigma#191 but for fields this time).
Yep, we had trouble for loggers in superclass/child class before.
Hmm, should we use random or rand? Most code (at least in blocks/items) uses random, which I think looks nicer.
nodes.diffHunk:

 	FIELD field_15744 octaveSamplers [Lnet/minecraft/class_3756;
+	METHOD <init> (Lnet/minecraft/class_2919;Lit/unimi/dsi/fastutil/ints/IntSortedSet;)V
+		ARG 1 rand
+		ARG 2 octaves
